prompt: Photorealistic close-up of a Chris DeRubeis artwork, focusing on a section with vibrant, swirling colors and intricate textures created by his unique metal grinding techniques. The lighting is dramatic, with a single, strong light source from the top left, creating deep shadows and highlighting the metallic sheen. The composition is a 16:9 landscape, with the detailed section of the artwork filling the frame, emphasizing the abstract expressionist style and the artist's signature use of metal as a canvas. The background is a blurred, dark gallery wall, adding depth and context. --ar 16:9
name: chris-derubeis-art-value-image-1.png

prompt: A wide, 16:9 landscape shot of a modern art gallery, showcasing a large, original Chris DeRubeis painting on metal as the centerpiece. The gallery is brightly lit with natural light streaming in from large windows on the right, reflecting off the polished metal surface of the artwork. The painting features bold, abstract shapes and vibrant colors, characteristic of DeRubeis's style. Several well-dressed art patrons are subtly visible in the midground, admiring the artwork from a respectful distance, adding a sense of scale and value. The floor is polished concrete, reflecting the light and the artwork. --ar 16:9
name: chris-derubeis-art-value-image-2.png

prompt: A 16:9 landscape image depicting an artist's studio, specifically designed to evoke Chris DeRubeis's workspace. The foreground shows a workbench with various power tools (grinders, sanders) and metal sheets, partially obscured by art supplies and paint splatters. In the background, a partially finished DeRubeis-style artwork on metal leans against a wall, catching the warm, golden light from a large window on the left. The overall atmosphere is one of creative energy and controlled chaos. The focus is sharp on the tools and materials, blurring slightly towards the background. --ar 16:9
name: chris-derubeis-art-value-image-3.png

prompt: A photorealistic 16:9 landscape image showing a hand, wearing a protective glove, holding a small, framed Chris DeRubeis artwork. The artwork is a miniature abstract piece on metal, showcasing his signature grinding techniques and vibrant colors. The background is an auction house setting, with blurred figures and other artworks visible in the distance. The lighting is soft and even, highlighting the texture and detail of the artwork. The hand is positioned slightly off-center to the left, allowing for a wider view of the auction environment. --ar 16:9
name: chris-derubeis-art-value-image-4.png

prompt: A 16:9 landscape image depicting a high-end, private art collection room. A large, framed Chris DeRubeis artwork on metal is prominently displayed on a feature wall, illuminated by strategically placed spotlights. The room is decorated in a minimalist, modern style, with dark wood paneling and plush, neutral-toned furniture. The artwork's vibrant colors and metallic sheen contrast beautifully with the subdued surroundings. The composition emphasizes the artwork as the focal point, with the room's design elements leading the eye towards it. The lighting is dramatic, creating a sense of luxury and exclusivity. --ar 16:9
name: chris-derubeis-art-value-image-5.png
